definition: disobedient to or defiant of law, someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime, declare illegal
details:
adjective
- disobedient to or defiant of law
= synonyms: lawless
- contrary to or forbidden by law
= synonyms: unlawful
noun
- someone who has committed a crime or has been legally convicted of a crime
= synonyms: criminal
verb
- declare illegal
= synonyms: criminalise, criminalize, illegalise, illegalize
